summary: Implements the Multi‑Scale Structural Similarity (MS‑SSIM) index for evaluating the perceptual similarity between two images or volumes. Supports arbitrary spatial dimensionality, configurable kernel type and size, stability constants, per‑scale weighting, and flexible reduction of the resulting scores.
business_intent: Provides a quantitative measure of image quality for tasks such as compression evaluation, denoising validation, generative model assessment, and medical imaging quality control.
